attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition Gordon Brown to hold a snap general election as has been requested by David Cameron and others on numerous occassions. 

The government, who is empowered and has been put in place by us, the people, has an obligation to listen to what the people want. 

We want our voices heard again and not simply to be told "we are listening" with no action. 

The economy is in its worst state in living memory, no more boom and bust we were promised. 

House prices have collapsed and dragged millions of people into poverty.

Unemployment is set to reach over 3 million by the end of this year.

Taxes are due to rise astronomically to repay the unprecedented levels of Government borrowing. Our children will be paying off this governments mistakes.   

Gordon Brown, do the right thing and allow the people of this great nation their voice, which you have repeatedly silenced or ignored.

We want our vote!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
